longInfo:
Passport required. 
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.

Visa required.

Visa Issuance:
- Holders of a pre-arranged visa can obtain a visa on arrival,
  provided:
  
Additional Information:
- Normal non-biometric passports issued to nationals of
  Armenia must contain an endorsement stating the validity of
  the passport for stays abroad
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 1 year of age.
Recommended:
- Vaccination against yellow fever for all passengers.
  Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year in the whole country.
  Recommended prevention: C.
